Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider and System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler. The CSharpCodeProvider and CodeDom ICodeCompiler provide a much richer set of functionality for specifying how to launch the compiler.")]

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider and System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler. The CSharpCodeProvider and CodeDom ICodeCompiler provide a much richer set of functionality for specifying how to launch the compiler.")>]

summary.span: C# 编译器的托管包装器。

span.span: Managed wrapper for the C# compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要编译 \# 进程中的 C 代码，请调用 。To compile C\# code in-process, call .

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile (string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, System.Collections.IDictionary options);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile(string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, class System.Collections.IDictionary options) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (sourceTexts As String(), sourceTextNames As String(), target As String, imports As String(), options As IDictionary) As CompilerError()

public: static cli::array <Microsoft::CSharp::CompilerError ^> ^ Compile(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTexts, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTextNames, System::String ^ target, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ imports, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ options);
static member Compile : string[] * string[] * string * string[] * System.Collections.IDictionary -> Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[]

param.name: sourceTexts
param.span: 类型字符串数组，每一个均使用 C\# 代码。

span.span: An array of type string, each with C\# code.

param.name: sourceTextNames
param.span: 包含每个 sourceTexts 的文件名的类型字符串数组。

span.span: An array of type string that contains the file names for each sourceTexts.

param.name: imports
param.span: 类型字符串数组，含要引用的文件。

span.span: An array of type string, with files to reference.

summary.span: 编译指定的目标文件的给定 C# 源。

span.span: Compiles the given C# sources to the specified destination file.

returns.span: 将诊断消息作为 类型的数组返回。

span.span: Returns diagnostic messages as an array of type .

returns.span: 数组为空或所有元素都为警告，表示编译成功。

span.span: If the array is empty or all elements are warnings, the compilation succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceTexts 参数中的每个字符串都等效于一个源文件。Each string in the sourceTexts parameter is the equivalent of a single source file. 必须至少有一个 sourceTexts 元素。There must be at least one sourceTexts element. SourceTextNames 参数中的文件名用于编译器诊断和调试信息。The file names in the sourceTextNames parameter are used for compiler diagnostics and debug information. 数组是必需的，但它可以通过使用 line 指令本地重写 \# 。The array is required, but it can be locally overridden by use of the \#line directive. 该数组必须具有与 sourceTexts 参数相同的元素数目。The array must have the same number of elements as the sourceTexts parameter. Imports 参数与/reference 编译器选项相同。The imports parameter is the same as the /reference compiler option. 此参数可以为 。This parameter can be . 对于 options 参数，该键是编译器选项的缩写形式。For the options parameter, the key is the short form of the compiler option. 值是选项所需的值。The value is the value desired for the option. Options 参数可以是 。The options parameter can be . 某些编译器选项无法识别。Some compiler options are not recognized. 可识别的选项和值：Recognized options and value: | 键名Key Name | 使用情况Usage | | --- | --- | | addmoduleaddmodule | 要包括在此程序集中的模块的列表。List of modules to include in this assembly. 模块名称必须由竖线或竖线分隔。The module names must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-addmodule (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/addmodule-compiler-option)。See [-addmodule (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/addmodule-compiler-option). | | baseaddressbaseaddress | 库的基址。Base address for libraries. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-baseaddress (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option)。See [-baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option). | | bugreportbugreport | 生成 bug 报告文件。Produces bug report file. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-bugreport (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/bugreport-compiler-option)。See [-bugreport (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/bugreport-compiler-option). | | checkedchecked | 将默认表达式计算设置为选中 (或未检查) 。Set default expression evaluation to checked (or unchecked). 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [) (c # 编译器选项 ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option)。See [-checked (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option). | | dd | 要定义的以分号分隔的符号列表。List of semicolon separated symbols to define. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-定义 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/define-compiler-option)。See [-define (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/define-compiler-option). | | debugdebug | 发出带有输出的调试信息。Emit debug information with output. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 不能指定 Full 或 pdb。Full or pdb-only cannot be specified. 请参阅 [-调试 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/debug-compiler-option)。See [-debug (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/debug-compiler-option). | | 文档doc | 要在其中放置 XML 注释的文件名。File name to put XML comments in. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-doc (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/doc-compiler-option)。See [-doc (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/doc-compiler-option). | | filealignfilealign | PE 部分的对齐大小。PE section alignment size. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-filealign (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/filealign-compiler-option)。See [-filealign (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/filealign-compiler-option). | | 增量incr | 启用增量重新生成。Enable incremental rebuild. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . | | liblib | 查找模块和引用程序集时要搜索的其他路径。Additional paths to search when locating modules and referenced assemblies. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-lib (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/lib-compiler-option)。See [-lib (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/lib-compiler-option). | | linkreslinkres | 将托管资源链接到程序集。Link a managed resource to the assembly. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-linkresource (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/linkresource-compiler-option)。See [-linkresource (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/linkresource-compiler-option). | | mm | 键入以搜索 Main 方法。Type to search in for the Main method. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-main (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/main-compiler-option)。See [-main (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/main-compiler-option). | | nostdlibnostdlib | 请勿自动引用 mscorlib.dll。Do not auto-reference mscorlib.dll. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-nostdlib (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option)。See [-nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option). | | nowarnnowarn | 不报告的以分号分隔的警告编号的列表。List of semicolon separated warning numbers to not report. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-nowarn (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nowarn-compiler-option)。See [-nowarn (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nowarn-compiler-option). | | oo | 启用编译器优化。Enable compiler optimizations. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-优化 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/optimize-compiler-option)。See [-optimize (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/optimize-compiler-option). | | rr | 引用的程序集。Referenced assemblies. 值必须为字符串类型。Value must be of type String. 如果指定了多个程序集，则文件名必须由竖线或竖线分隔。If more than one assembly is specified, the file name must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 请参阅 [-引用 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/reference-compiler-option)。See [-reference (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/reference-compiler-option). | | resres | 嵌入托管资源。Embed a managed resource. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-resource (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option)。See [-resource (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option). | | 目标target | 输出文件目标类型，为下列其中一项： "library"、"exe"、"winexe" 或 "module"。Output file target type, one of the following: "library", "exe", "winexe", or "module". 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-目标 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/target-compiler-option)。See [-target (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/target-compiler-option). | | unsafeunsafe | 允许不安全的构造。Allow unsafe constructs. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-c # 编译器选项 () ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/unsafe-compiler-option)。See [-unsafe (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/unsafe-compiler-option). | | ww | 警告等级 (0-4) 。Warning level (0-4). 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-警告 (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/warn-compiler-option)。See [-warn (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/warn-compiler-option). | | warnaserrorwarnaserror | 将警告诊断报告为错误。Report warning diagnostics as errors. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-warnaserror (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/warnaserror-compiler-option)。See [-warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/warnaserror-compiler-option). | | win32iconwin32icon | 自动生成的 Win32 资源的 win32 图标。Win32 icon for auto generated Win32 resource. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-win32icon (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/win32icon-compiler-option)。See [-win32icon (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/win32icon-compiler-option). | | win32reswin32res | Win32 资源文件。Win32 resource file. 值的类型必须为 。Value must be of type . 请参阅 [-win32res (c # 编译器选项) ](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/win32res-compiler-option)。See [-win32res (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/win32res-compiler-option). |
